mapper.select: SELECT /* noticeCount */ COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATE ="upload"
SELECT /* noticeList */ NO_NUM, NO_TITLE FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATE = "upload" ORDER BY NO_NUM DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
SELECT /* read */ NO_NUM, NO_TITLE, NO_CONTENT, NO_STATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_NUM = #{noNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* delete */ NOTICE SET NO_STATE = "delete" WHERE NO_NUM = #{noNum}
UPDATE /* update */ NOTICE SET NO_TITLE = #{noTitle}, NO_CONTENT = #{noContent}, WHERE NO_NUM = #{noNum}
